thread.title: Dianne Brockman
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by Dianne Brockman

author: Dianne Brockman
title: Dianne Brockman
text: From dealing with the representative, who was excellent and followed up with us all the time, to the representatives who were getting the proofs done and to us for signature, to promptness and courtesy, they were excellent and I would recommend Blumberg to anyone.
